job.title: Product Researcher
job.description: Job DescriptionPosition Details:Role: Product ResearcherLocation: Mason, OHDuration: 6 MonthsResponsibilitiesPast Products Researcher experience at the Researcher/Associate Scientist levelExecutes technical tasks and methods to meet day-to-day project needsPerforms a wide variety of lab methods and hands-on experimentationHelps enable product test placements (either through systems entry or gathering the info for others to enter)Helps develop claims and demos with the products research leadShould you have any questions, feel free to call me at (973)-494-8185 or email your resume at nagraj.ganaparpu@collabera.com.Job RequirementsWord, research, SAN, AppleJob Code: 50170917
